DOC.brief_summary: Numerous study Have show limb ischemic preconditioning protect vital organ ( include heart ) ischemia-reperfusion injury , broad application prospect.But mechanism still unclear . Evidence show humoral mechanism may play important role . This study carry limb ischemic preconditioning healthy volunteer , collect serum different time point treatment , classify identify serum protein different period limb ischemic preconditioning , use method include high abundant protein removal , Two-dimensional electrophoresis chromatography mass spectrometry , analyse activation synthesis proteins order search proteins peptide whose synthesis activate ischemic preconditioning . This study first systemic explore change serum protein limb ischemic preconditioning human body , lay theoretical basis clinical application limb ischemic preconditioning explore humoral mechanism , thus provide clue search protein peptide protective effect organ .
DOC.brief_title: Study Cardioprotection Humoral Mechanism Limb Ischemia Preconditioning
DOC.detailed_description: We aim assess whether limb ischemic preconditioning protects remote tissue organ humoral mechanism .
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer age 2030 year old cardiac，hepatic renal，peripheral vascular disease willing enter study sign write informed consent young 20 year old old 30 year old cardiac，hepatic renal，peripheral vascular disease refuse enter study sign write informed consent
